flawed_nl_solution:
They scored an average of 720/24=<<720/24=30>>30 points in their previous games
Half that many would be 30/2=<<30/2=15>>15 points
So in the finals, they scored 15-2=<<15-2=13>>13 points
Their opponent thus scored 13-2=<<13-2=6>>6 points
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
